title: [GAMEPLAY] Kennen Ult graphics missing!
body: I'm pretty sure this has been reported before, but Kennen's ult is still (or is now) missing the graphics. I was in an ARAM earlier today against a Kennen and whenever he ulted we couldn't see it, just the bolts that drop down on us if we're in it.

replies.body: We're currently in the process of running compatibility tests in regards to Kennen's ult - it may be possible that certain configs are causing the issue here (particularly graphics cards), as we're not able to get a 100% repro on this issue. Thanks for the report! ^-^
